title: Picture Hangers for Dummies - WHERE HAVE THESE BEEN ALL MY LIFE????
author: Erica Godsey
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2025
review_text:
I am the worst picture hanger ever! I could never get frames level, equidistant, or in the right spot without leaving several holes in the wall. For years I relied on 3M Command strips, which seemed great until the adhesive started degrading and my glass frames fell, ruining several expensive pieces.

Enter the 3M CLAW Drywall Picture Hangers — an absolute game-changer! The spot marker feature makes hanging pictures foolproof: attach the marker to the frame, hold it level, press it to the wall, and mark the spot. Then just insert the claw and hang your picture. Every single time, my frames were hung perfectly level, with no extra holes, no frustration, and no do-overs.

The claws seat securely in drywall or studs, with no need for anchors, and they hold strong — so much more reliable than adhesive strips. Honestly, these have made picture hanging stress-free and even enjoyable. Highly recommend to anyone who’s ever struggled like me!
product_title: 3M CLAW(TM) 15 lb. Drywall Picture Hanger With Spot Marker, Heavyweight Hanging Solution for Room Decor and Office Space Decor, Including Mirrors or Large Art – 6 Pack

title: Very Sturdy for Heavier Items
author: Stacie
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2025
review_text:
These are powerful, but a little modification to the directions was needed for me. I had 2 mirrors (one that is 18lbs, the other 25lbs.) that I was hanging on newly painted and wallpapered walls. I was unable to push them into the walls like the directions said.

I ended up having to drill holes and then hammer these in (drywall and wood paneling, as it’s a 1950s home). Although the installation process was more involved than I thought, these have held steady. I used 2, 45lb. capacity on each mirror to make sure they were secure.

I still feel the installation process was easy to make my final product look great. Would get again!
product_title: 3M CLAW(TM) 15 lb. Drywall Picture Hanger With Spot Marker, Heavyweight Hanging Solution for Room Decor and Office Space Decor, Including Mirrors or Large Art – 6 Pack

title: 3M Claws all the way!
author: s1l3ntk1ll3r
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2025
review_text: Seriously, why isn't everyone using this stuff? It's amazing! I hang all my heavy art (paintings/wood work) and mirrors with 3M claws or tape, and they never budge, even when I bump into them. The quality is insane, and the engineering is just *chef's kiss*. As an engineer, I love not having to drill and just being able to push them in. Okay, sometimes they're not the easiest to push, but a little tap with a hammer (saves you from sore thumbs) gets them going, and then you can hang stuff without worrying! I've used these for years and tell everyone about them when they move. Thanks, 3M!
product_title: 3M CLAW(TM) 15 lb. Drywall Picture Hanger With Spot Marker, Heavyweight Hanging Solution for Room Decor and Office Space Decor, Including Mirrors or Large Art – 6 Pack

title: Still holding tight!
author: Jay Ann Cox
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2025
review_text: I heard about the Claw on a YouTube video, and decided I would try to hang a few shoulder mounted deer with these. I weighed the heads, and none were over 30 lbs. So far, they are holding tight and I didn't have to use studs or hang them in awkward places. They are sturdy and a good price. I took off one star because I can't just "push" them into the wall with fingers as instructed. I used a rubber mallet which can bend the hanger part toward the wall, defeating the purpose. I found a way to make it work, but I hope the Claw folks figure out how to use tools in the next evolution of this product.
product_title: 3M CLAW(TM) 15 lb. Drywall Picture Hanger With Spot Marker, Heavyweight Hanging Solution for Room Decor and Office Space Decor, Including Mirrors or Large Art – 6 Pack

title: Great product for hanging items with ease
author: Cid
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2025
review_text: This claws are amazing for hanging things. I don't have to find nails and a hammer and then make big holes in my walls. All you do is line it up where you want your item hanged and put the claws into the wall...so easy. They have different weights to hang heavier things. They're the perfect size as they're not bulky or jut out of the wall, only the hooks to hang your item. They are very sturdy and hold items well. I will always use these now to hang things on the walls as they are so easy to use and a great value for the job that they do. I would definitely recommend these.
product_title: 3M CLAW(TM) 15 lb. Drywall Picture Hanger With Spot Marker, Heavyweight Hanging Solution for Room Decor and Office Space Decor, Including Mirrors or Large Art – 6 Pack

date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2025
review_text:
I bought the 3M CLAW 65 lb. Drywall Picture Hanger, a few months ago, and overall, I would give it a solid 4 out of 5 stars.

On the positive side, the hangers are incredibly easy to install and come with handy spot markers that help ensure precise placement. I appreciate that they can hold a decent amount of weight, making them suitable for heavier items, such as mirrors or large art pieces. This feature is especially useful for anyone looking to decorate their space or utilize the wall space. They are quite expensive, hence taking away one star.

title: They WORK!
author: CA Sunshine
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2025
review_text:
I have a clock I love and found the perfect location for it. As we started putting a nail in the wall we knew we hit something. It ended up being the metal ventilation ducting. Thankfully we didn’t nail hard but gently to make sure we didn’t damage anything behind the wall.

I was so disappointed, I literally did not a wall to hang my favorite clock on. I searched for a solution and found the claw. I didn’t believe this would work but the reviews convinced me to try. IT WORKED! I made sure we bought the appropriate weight capacity and amazed at how well these work.

If you have a wall but not sure what’s behind it these will work! I love these genius products that make the impossible possible!
product_title: 3M CLAW(TM) 15 lb. Drywall Picture Hanger With Spot Marker, Heavyweight Hanging Solution for Room Decor and Office Space Decor, Including Mirrors or Large Art – 6 Pack
